short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block channels, homefeed, shorts,recomemndations, and more for a distraction-free Youtube experience with single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Blocker Pro - All-in-One YouTube Content Blocker  

Take Control of Your YouTube Experience!  
Tired of wasting time on low-quality, clickbait, and distracting content on YouTube? YouTube BrainRot Blocker is the ultimate solution to help you stay focused, productive, and distraction-free. Block channels, keywords, recommendations, comments, Shorts, and more with just a few clicks. Whether you're studying, working, or just want a cleaner YouTube experience, this extension has you covered.  

Key Features:  

1. Block Channels  
- Curated Lists: Automatically block low-quality channels from categories like drama, clickbait, pranks, and more.  
- Custom Blocking: Manually block specific channels by URL or name.  
- Temporary Blocks: Block channels for 30 minutes, 1 hour, 24 hours, or permanently.  

2. Block Keywords  
- Curated Keywords: Block clickbait titles like "GONE WRONG," "3 AM CHALLENGE," and "MUST WATCH."  
- Custom Keywords: Add your own keywords to block videos with specific phrases.  
- Advanced Options: Choose case-sensitive or whole-word matching for precise blocking.  

3. Block Recommendations & Comments  
- Hide Recommendations: Remove the distracting "Up Next" and recommended videos sidebar.  
- Block Comments: Hide comments sections to avoid spoilers, toxicity, and time-wasting threads.  

4. Block Shorts  
- Hide Shorts: Remove YouTube Shorts from your homepage, search results, and Shorts pages.  
- Custom Message: Replace Shorts with a motivational message to keep you focused.  

5. Block Home Feed  
- Clean Homepage: Remove the entire YouTube home feed for a distraction-free start.  
- Custom Message: Display a motivational message to remind you of your goals.  

6. Easy-to-Use Toggles  
- Quick Settings: Enable or disable blocking for specific features (e.g., Shorts, comments, recommendations) with a single toggle.  
- Real-Time Updates: Changes take effect instantly without needing to reload the page.  

7. Weekly Updates  
- Curated Lists: Get weekly updates to block the latest low-quality channels and keywords.  
- Customizable: Exclude specific channels or keywords from the curated lists.  

Why Choose YouTube BrainRot Blocker?  

- Boost Productivity: Remove distractions and focus on what matters most.  
- Customizable: Tailor your YouTube experience to your preferences.  
- Easy to Use: Simple interface with powerful features.  
- Privacy-Focused: No data collectionâ€”your browsing stays private.  

How It Works:  

1. Install the Extension: Add YouTube BrainRot Blocker to Chrome in just a few clicks.  
2. Customize Settings: Choose what to block (channels, keywords, comments, Shorts, etc.).  
3. Enjoy a Cleaner YouTube: Say goodbye to distractions and hello to a better YouTube experience.  

Perfect For:  

- Students: Block distractions while studying or doing homework.  
- Professionals: Stay focused during work hours.  
- Parents: Create a safer, more controlled YouTube environment for kids.  
- Anyone: Take back control of your time and attention.  

SEO-Optimized Keywords:  

- YouTube content blocker  
- Block YouTube distractions  
- Hide YouTube comments  
- Block YouTube recommendations  
- YouTube Shorts blocker  
- Clean YouTube homepage  
- Block clickbait on YouTube  
- YouTube focus tool  
- Productivity extension for YouTube  
- Block low-quality YouTube channels  
- YouTube keyword blocker  
- Distraction-free YouTube
